title: Fierce
description: Pack Rule #5: Happy mate, happy fate.Fate has it in for me. She’s sent me the sassiest, strong-willed female imaginable. Wolf Ranch’s new veterinarian. A human who thinks I do everything wrong.Thinks she knows large animals better than I do.And who doesn’t want anything to do with me.But I knew the first time I caught her scent she belonged to me.So I’ll show her a large animal. One she can’t resist. Or at least one who can’t resist her.I’ll prove she doesn’t know everything about four-legged beasts.Especially not the fiercest ones who stalk their prey in the night. Especially not one determined to prey on her.Me.
author: Renee Rose
